attributes.action: exclude the Bishops from the House of Lords alongside the hereditary peers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister has repeatedly stated that hereditary peers have no place in a democracy like Britain. Whether people agree with this or not, it is unclear how the presence of Anglican Bishops *is* appropriate.

They represent a very small section of the community, and if the hereditaries are going, so should the Bishops.
